ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Slashing weapons for bards question...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Fret not!  I said he *included* it in a trade.  I know there were two FS weopons, plus a ring (Dex +2 I think) plus *something* else, but I honestly can t
ygData.messageBody:
Harmonic wrote:
> heh. FS rapier = 5pp value to player.
> HQ bear skin = 20pp-30pp value to tailor.

Fret not! I said he *included* it in a trade. I know there were two FS
weopons, plus a ring (Dex +2 I think) plus *something* else, but I honestly
can't remember what. I divied the loot up between three of my characters.

I'm not too concerned if I couldn't have gotten more out of it. For one
thing, I've never been offered more than 7 pp for those HQ bear skins. For
another thing, FS weopons cost a lot more than I can afford from vendors,
and I had killed enough bears that I didn't mind trading one of the skins
away. I still have more.

> North Karana gypsy camp down the road from the wizard
> spires is a good
> place. Just keep an eye out for Grimfeather.

Thanks. For some reason I was convinced the vendor was in West Karana. No
wonder I couldn't find her!

> However in the age of a mature server, you should be looking for
> a dragoon dirk (10pp-30pp) which have better stats than any combine
> weapon does.

Oh let's hope so. Maybe I'll just trade another HQ Bear skin? ;^)

Peace
Evulia, bard of 10 verses, Tunare
